## RuntimeScript.onUpdate() method

Called every update/tick while the script is active.

Typical usage includes per-frame logic, animation, and input handling.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onUpdate(_deltaTime: number, _elapsedTime: number): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

\_deltaTime


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Time since last update in seconds.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

\_elapsedTime


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Total elapsed time since start in seconds.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
